name: XRWebGLLayer.XRWebGLLayer
description: The WebXR Device API XRWebGLLayer() constructor creates and returns a new XRWebGLLayer object, providing the linkage between the WebXR device and the WebGL graphics layer used to render the 3D scene.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRWebGLLayer()' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
